req1: The target distance shall not be shown on the dmi unless selected by the driver.
req2: The supervised speed shall not be shown on the dmi.

req1: The train shall be supervised to a ceiling speed as a minimum.
req2: The supervised speed shall not be shown on the dmi.

req1: This ceiling speed shall not be shown continually on the dmi but may be shown momentarily when selected by the driver.
req2: The supervised speed shall not be shown on the dmi.

req1: The current operational status shall be indicated to the driver on the dmi.
req2: The target distance shall not be shown on the dmi unless selected by the driver.

req1: The target distance to be displayed on the dmi shall be based on the most restrictive braking curve.
req2: The target distance shall not be shown on the dmi unless selected by the driver.

req1: The train shall be supervised to a ceiling speed as a minimum.
req2: The target distance shall not be shown on the dmi unless selected by the driver.

req1: This ceiling speed shall not be shown continually on the dmi but may be shown momentarily when selected by the driver.
req2: The target distance shall not be shown on the dmi unless selected by the driver.

req1: The current operational status shall be indicated to the driver on the dmi.
req2: The target distance to be displayed on the dmi shall be based on the most restrictive braking curve.

req1: In partial supervision the train shall be supervised according to train speed and distance data available.
req2: The train shall be supervised according to train speed data available.

req1: The current operational status shall be indicated to the driver on the dmi.
req2: The train shall be supervised to a ceiling speed as a minimum.

req1: The supervised shunting speed shall be indicated to the driver on request.
req2: The train shall be supervised to a ceiling speed as a minimum.

req1: The train shall have the capability of being supervised to a ceiling speed.
req2: The train shall be supervised to a ceiling speed as a minimum.

req1: This ceiling speed shall not be shown continually on the dmi but may be shown momentarily when selected by the driver.
req2: The train shall be supervised to a ceiling speed as a minimum.

req1: The train shall leave partial supervision when the trainborne equipment is not operative any longer when shunting is selected or when full supervision is available.
req2: The trainborne equipment shall remain in full supervision until the trainborne equipment is not active any longer when shunting is selected or when partial supervision information is received.

req1: When changing to a lower speed level, the front end of the train shall respect the dynamic train speed profile.
req2: When changing to a higher speed level, the rear end of the train shall respect the static train speed profile.

req1: The current operational status shall be indicated to the driver on the dmi.
req2: When the plain text message appears on the dmi, the driver shall be alerted.

req1: The emergency stop shall be indicated to the driver on the dmi.
req2: When the plain text message appears on the dmi, the driver shall be alerted.

req1: The release speed shall be indicated on the dmi.
req2: When the plain text message appears on the dmi, the driver shall be alerted.

req1: The target distance shall not be shown on the dmi unless selected by the driver.
req2: When the plain text message appears on the dmi, the driver shall be alerted.

req1: The etcs on-board shall be capable of receiving information regarding air tightness from the trackside.
req2: When the traction unit has come to a standstill, the driver shall be able to release the emergency brake.

req1: The driver shall be able to override the function when the train is stationary.
req2: When the traction unit is stationary, the driver shall be required to acknowledge the train trip condition.

req1: The emergency brake shall be applied until the traction unit is stationary.
req2: When the traction unit is stationary, the driver shall be required to acknowledge the train trip condition.

req1: The emergency stop shall be indicated to the driver on the dmi.
req2: When the traction unit is stationary, the driver shall be required to acknowledge the train trip condition.

req1: When the traction unit has come to a standstill, the driver shall be able to release the emergency brake.
req2: When the traction unit is stationary, the driver shall be required to acknowledge the train trip condition.

req1: Visual and acoustic warnings to the driver about possible intervention from etcs shall be given to enable the driver to react and avoid intervention.
req2: Within the braking curve area, a warning shall be given to the driver to enable him to react and avoid intervention from etcs equipment at least 5 sec before the intervention.
